TemplateSQL.FixedSQL: SET NOCOUNT ON /******************************************/ /* 파일정보 - T_FILE 조회 - SELECT QUERY */ /******************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT A.TABLE_NAME , A.TABLE_KEY , A.FILE_SEQ , A.FILE_TYPE , A.FILE_NAME , A.FILE_EXT , A.FILE_URL , A.REF_DATA1 , A.REF_DATA2 , A.REMARK , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE FROM T_FILE A WHERE 1=1 #[TABLE_NAME] #[TABLE_KEY] #[FILE_SEQ] SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /****************************************/ /* 파일정보 - T_FILE 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /****************************************/ DECLARE @TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(30) = N'{0}' , @TABLE_KEY VARCHAR(20) = N'{1}' , @FILE_SEQ INT = N'{2}' , @FILE_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{3}') = 1 THEN '{3}' ELSE '0' END ) , @FILE_NAME NVARCHAR(100) = N'{4}' , @FILE_EXT VARCHAR(30) = N'{5}' , @FILE_URL NVARCHAR(200) = N'{6}' , @REF_DATA1 NVARCHAR(200) = N'{7}' , @REF_DATA2 NVARCHAR(200) = N'{8}' , @REMARK NVARCHAR(50) = N'{9}' , @INSERT_CODE INT = {10} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
IF @FILE_SEQ <= 0 BEGIN SELECT @FILE_SEQ = ISNULL(MAX(FILE_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM T_FILE WHERE TABLE_NAME = @TABLE_NAME AND TABLE_KEY = @TABLE_KEY END
UPDATE A SET FILE_TYPE = @FILE_TYPE , FILE_NAME = @FILE_NAME , FILE_EXT = @FILE_EXT , FILE_URL = @FILE_URL , REF_DATA1 = @REF_DATA1 , REF_DATA2 = @REF_DATA2 , REMARK = @REMARK
FROM T_FILE A WHERE TABLE_NAME= @TABLE_NAME AND TABLE_KEY= @TABLE_KEY AND FILE_SEQ= @FILE_SEQ IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_FILE ( TABLE_NAME , TABLE_KEY , FILE_SEQ , FILE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , FILE_EXT , FILE_URL , REF_DATA1 , REF_DATA2 , REMARK , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE
) SELECT @TABLE_NAME , @TABLE_KEY , @FILE_SEQ , @FILE_TYPE , @FILE_NAME , @FILE_EXT , @FILE_URL , @REF_DATA1 , @REF_DATA2 , @REMARK , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE
END SELECT @FILE_SEQ AS FILE_SEQ SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /******************************************/ /* 파일정보 - T_FILE 삭제 - Delete QUERY */ /******************************************/ DECLARE @TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(30) = N'{0}' , @TABLE_KEY VARCHAR(20) = N'{1}' , @FILE_SEQ INT = N'{2}'
DELETE A FROM T_FILE A WHERE TABLE_NAME= @TABLE_NAME AND TABLE_KEY= @TABLE_KEY AND FILE_SEQ= @FILE_SEQ
SELECT @FILE_SEQ AS FILE_SEQ
SET NOCOUNT OFF
